name: HUILO II Bugger King
description:
HUILO II "BUGGER KING" The final race.

Funny (an easily recognizable world-famous image) and addictive game from the ARCADE PLATFORMER genre.

The game "BUGGER KING", the second in a series of games developed by our team, with a "similar" character. Three related levels:

- ground,

-air,

-underground.

Also, after losing all lives, the player has the opportunity to play an additional level - "welcome to hell!"

BUGGER KING ARCADE PLATFORM becomes infinitely more difficult as you progress through the gameplay. The player can not only run and dodge obstacles, he is armed, he has an aircraft at his disposal to counter the missiles flying at him. The player can earn points for completing stages, and also has the ability to earn extra points by collecting artifacts.

In-game purchases:

Advertising, in-game store, the ability to make charitable contributions (donations) for Ukraine.

Game available for download
